description.value: Ysoki are scrappy and nimble even when the odds are against them. A ysoki can stand from @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.XeRGqHVtcZ7vsgJ0]{Prone} as a swift action. Additionally, when @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.QnGpBSHSTiszjPSb]{Off-Kilter}, a ysoki does not take the normal penalties to attacks or gain the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.MZ8OoH1GE9qDMyCD]{Flat-footed} condition. When attempting an @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.3QdtsfnVJsHEdrt0]{Acrobatics} check to tumble through the space of an opponent at least one size category larger than himself, a ysoki receive a +5 racial bonus to the check.

modifiers.name: Moxie
modifiers.notes: When attempting an  Acrobatics check to tumble through the space of an opponent at least one size category larger than himself, a ysoki receive a +5 racial bonus to the check.
